edu.holycross.shot.nysi
[Groovy] Class ImageCollection

java.lang.Object
  edu.holycross.shot.nysi.ImageCollection

class ImageCollection

A class for configuring the CITE Image extension for a single CITE Collections.

Property Summary
java.lang.String captionProperty

Name of the CITE Collection property to use for captions.
java.lang.String label

A human-readable label for the collection.
java.lang.String path

Path to the file system root for pyramidal images.
java.lang.String rightsProperty

Name of the CITE Collection property to use for rights statements.
CiteUrn urn

URN for the Collection.
 
Constructor Summary
ImageCollection(java.util.ArrayList config)

Constructor made from an ordered list of configuration values.

Constructor Detail

ImageCollection

ImageCollection(java.util.ArrayList config)
Constructor made from an ordered list of configuration values.
throws:
Exception if config does not contain 5 elements, or if the String value of the urn property does not form a valid CITE URN.
Parameters:
config - A five-element ArrayList defining the values for all the members of an ImageCollection.
